titleStmt.title: A declaration of the officers and armies, illegall, injurious, proceedings and practises against the XI. impeached members: (not to be parallel'd in any age) and tending to the utter subversion of free Parliaments, rights, priviledges, freedome, and all common justice. And to introduce a meer arbitrary power in the very highest court of iustice.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Prynne by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
